about.heading: About Me
about.content: I am a Full stack developer with expertise in front-end development. While doing my Bachelor in Civil Engineering, I got into programming and went on to create a computer vision software presenting the same as a technical paper at VIT, Vellore for American Society of Civil Engineers(ASCE) following which my passion for coding brought me into IT industry. Hence, for the past 2+ years I have been working for a truly international company, as part of a multi-national team, alongside other front-end developers, back end developers, project managers, content managers and designers.
